name: Notion Project Manager
description: Project Management made effortless with this easy to use Notion Project management Template.Manage your Projects seamlessly with this customisable Notion Template. Manage your Tasks, relate them to projects and keep track of your works in a systematic way.Never Miss a task with the task overdue feature! FAQs1. What is Notion?Notion is a comprehensive and fully-integrated workspace that simplifies note-taking, task management, project planning, and organisation. Designed with versatility in mind,
